_header: Now of this feast tell I can
_description: The Feest of Tottenham — seventeen 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

CULFf548.First Lines:
Now of þis feest telle I canI trow as wel as any
                    man…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…haue eten þe meytis I reckand herebut þeirs bodys
                    had br[ ]
